enGB: My Feat
This is my feat, not your feat.
Focused Infusion(Free)
zhCN: 聚能灌注（自由）

enGB: On Cooldown
zhCN: 冷却中……

enGB: When the cruoromancer uses this infusion, he adds +1 to the DC of the infused necromancy spell. This ability can be used only once per round. At 5th level, the bonus increases to +2. At 8th level, this infusion becomes a free action.
zhCN: 融血师以此形式灌注血液之力时，被灌注的死灵法术难度等级+1。此能力每回合只能使用一次。5级时，加值提升至+2；8级时，此灌注改为一个自由动作。

enGB: Sickening Infusion(Free)
zhCN: 恶心灌注（自由）

enGB: On Cooldown
zhCN: 冷却中……

enGB: When the cruoromancer uses this infusion, a creature that takes damage from the infused necromancy spell becomes sickened for (1 + half your wizard level) rounds. You can use this ability only once per turn. At 8th level, this infusion becomes a free action.
zhCN: 融血师以此形式灌注血液之力时，受到被灌注的死灵法术伤害的生物陷入恶心状态，持续1 + 你的法师等级的一半的轮数。此能力每回合只能使用一次。8级时，此灌注改为一个自由动作。

enGB: Blood Infusion (Free)
zhCN: 融血灌注（自由）

enGB: Wizard Bonus Feat (Augment Summoning)
zhCN: 法师额外专长（增强召唤）

enGB: At 6th level, the cruoromancer gains a wizard bonus feat, which must be Augment Summoning.
zhCN: 融血师6级时获得一个法师额外专长，固定为增强召唤。

enGB: When using this infusion with animate dead, the summoned undead and your undead companions gain a +4 inherent bonus to Strength and Charisma for 1 minute per caster level. At 15th level, summoned undead and your undead companions affected in this way also gain temporary hit points equal to three times your wizard level.
zhCN: 通过在施放操纵亡者时以此形式灌注血液之力，你召唤出的死灵生物以及不死生物伙伴将在力量和魅力属性上获得+4天赋加值，持续时间为每施法者等级一分钟。15级时，以此方式召唤的死灵生物以及不死生物伙伴额外获得数值为三倍你法师等级的临时生命值。

enGB: Profane Infusion
zhCN: 亵渎灌注

enGB: When the cruoromancer uses this infusion, the infused necromancy spell gains a +2 bonus to its caster level. You can use this ability only once per turn, as a free action.
zhCN: 当融血师以此形式灌注血液之力时，被灌注的死灵法术施法者等级获得+2加值。此能力每回合只能使用一次，为自由动作。

enGB: At 20th level, a cruoromancer can use his blood infusions without spending hit points. In addition, the bonuses granted by his Focused Infusion and Profane Infusion increase to +4.
zhCN: 达到20级后，融血师施展融血灌注时不再消耗生命值。此外，其聚能灌注与亵渎灌注所提供的加值提升至+4。

enGB: As a standard action, you can channel positive energy, causing all undead within 30 feet to become panicked. Undead can attempt a Will saving throw to resist this effect, the DC of this save is equal to (10 + half your cleric level + your Charisma modifier). Undead that fail the save flee for 1 minute, and can attempt a new saving throw each round to end the effect. Additionally, deal (1d4 + half your wizard level + your Intelligence modifier) damage to all hostile undead creatures within the area. When channel energy is used in this way, it produces no other effect (such as healing or harming nearby creatures).
zhCN: 以一个标准动作，你可以引导正向能量，使30尺内的所有不死生物陷入惊恐状态并四处逃窜。不死生物可以进行意志豁免来抵抗该效果，豁免难度等级为10+1/2你的牧师等级+你的魅力调整值。豁免失败的不死生物将逃窜1分钟，并且每轮都可以进行一次新的豁免以提前结束该效果。此外，此次引导能量还会对区域内所有敌对的死灵生物造成1d4+1/2你的法师等级+你的智力调整值的伤害。若以此方式使用引导能量，它将不会产生任何治疗或其他效果。

enGB: Undead Touch
zhCN: 不死之触

enGB: As a standard action, you can touch an undead creature and infuse it with negative energy. This grants the target a +1 profane bonus on attack rolls and saving throws, plus 1 temporary hit point per caster level. The bonus on attacks and saves increases by 1 for every 5 wizard levels you possess. These bonuses last for a number of rounds equal to half your wizard level (minimum 1 round). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Intelligence modifier.
zhCN: 以一个标准动作，你可以碰触一个不死生物并替它注入负能量。使其攻击跟豁免检定的+1亵渎加值，以及每施法者等级1点的临时生命值。在攻击和豁免的加值会在你每5个法师等级增加1点。这些加值持续法师等级一半的轮数（至少1轮）。你每天可以使用这个能力的次数为3+智力调整值。

enGB: Dead Sight
zhCN: 亡者视野

enGB: You emit a 30-foot-radius aura. You and all undead within the aura gain a +1 profane bonus on ability checks, attack rolls, saving throws, and damage rolls. Hostile living creatures within the aura take a –1 penalty on ability checks, attack rolls, saving throws, and damage rolls. Additionally, you gain blindsight.
zhCN: 你发出一道30英尺范围的灵光。你自身与灵光范围内的所有不死生物在属性检定、攻击检定、豁免检定和伤害检定上获得+1亵渎加值；范围内的敌对活物在属性检定、攻击检定、豁免检定和伤害检定上受到-1减值。此外，你自身获得盲视。

enGB:
When a cruoromancer casts a Spell of the necromancy school, he can opt to infuse that spell with his undead-tainted blood as a swift action. As he increases in level, the power and effects of such infusions become more potent. Each time a cruoromancer uses blood infusion, he drains a portion of his own blood either by cutting himself with a blade or by opening a scab from a previous wound. When he does this, he takes an amount of damage equal to 1d4 + half his wizard level.
At 1st level, they can infuse their necromancy spells in either of the following ways:
Focused Infusion: When the cruoromancer uses this infusion, they adds +1 to the DC of the infused necromancy spell. This ability can be used only once per round. At 5th level, the bonus increases to +2. At 8th level, this infusion becomes a free action.
Sickening Infusion: When the cruoromancer channels blood power in this way, a creature that takes damage from the infused necromancy spell becomes sickened for 1 + half your wizard level rounds. You can use this ability only once per turn. At 8th level, this infusion becomes a free action.
zhCN:
融血师在施放死灵学派的法术时，可以选择花费迅捷动作，将自己被死灵能量污染的血液之力灌注入该法术当中。随着等级提升，这些灌注效果和威力都会变得更强。每次施展融血灌注时，融血师要用刀割伤自己，或者揭开旧伤口的结痂，从而流失自身的一部分血液。这么做会让他受到1d4+法师等级一半的伤害。
1级起，他可以用以下任一形式灌注死灵法术：
聚能灌注：融血师以此形式灌注血液之力时，被灌注的死灵法术难度等级+1。此能力每回合只能使用一次。5级时，加值提升至+2；8级时，此灌注改为一个自由动作。
恶心灌注：融血师以此形式灌注血液之力时，受到被灌注的死灵法术伤害的生物陷入恶心状态，持续1 + 你的法师等级的一半的轮数。此能力每回合只能使用一次。8级时，此灌注改为一个自由动作。

enGB:
The dread and feared necromancer commands undead and uses the foul power of unlife against his enemies.
Power over undead: You receive Turn Undead as a bonus feat. You can channel energy a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Intelligence modifier, but only to use this feat. The DC to save against these feats is equal to 10 + half your Wizard level + your Charisma modifier. At 20th level, undead cannot add their channel resistance to the save against this ability.
Undead Touch: As a standard action, you can touch an undead creature and infuse it with negative energy. This grants the target a +1 profane bonus on attack rolls and saving throws, plus 1 temporary hit point per caster level. The bonus on attacks and saves increases by 1 for every 5 wizard levels you possess. These bonuses last for a number of rounds equal to half your wizard level (minimum 1 round). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Intelligence modifier.
Dead Sight: You emit a 30-foot-radius aura. You and all undead within the aura gain a +1 profane bonus on ability checks, attack rolls, saving throws, and damage rolls. Hostile living creatures within the aura take a –1 penalty on ability checks, attack rolls, saving throws, and damage rolls. Additionally, you gain blindsight.
zhCN:
狰狞骇人的死灵师可命令不死生物，并使用禁忌的不死生命力量来对抗敌人。
驾驭亡者：你获得驱散死灵作为额外专长。你每天可引导能量的次数为智力调整值+3，但这些次数仅可被用于该专长。该专长的豁免检定难度等级为10+1/2法师等级+魅力调整值。达到20级后，不死生物将无法在针对此能力进行豁免检定时附加它们的引导抗性加值。
不死之触：以一个标准动作，你可以碰触一个不死生物并替它注入负能量。使其攻击跟豁免检定的+1亵渎加值，以及每施法者等级1点的临时生命值。在攻击和豁免的加值会在你每5个法师等级增加1点。这些加值持续法师等级一半的轮数（至少1轮）。你每天可以使用这个能力的次数为3+智力调整值。
亡者视野：你发出一道30英尺范围的灵光。你自身与灵光范围内的所有不死生物在属性检定、攻击检定、豁免检定和伤害检定上获得+1亵渎加值；范围内的敌对活物在属性检定、攻击检定、豁免检定和伤害检定上受到-1减值。此外，你自身获得盲视。

enGB: Blood Line Undead
zhCN: 亡灵血承

enGB:
Your family atmosphere is filled with a foul smell of a cemetery. Perhaps your ancestors were powerful necromancers or vampires, or maybe you were a deceased person who was suddenly brought back to life. Anyway, the power of death flows through you, influencing every action you make. You can summon the evil power of the dead. Unfortunately, each time you use this power, you get closer to joining them.
Necromancer Bloodline Extra Talent: Combat Casting, Hardened Stone, Iron Will, Skill Focus (Knowledge: Religion), Spell Focus, High Spell Focus, Robust, Tenacious.
zhCN:
你的家族弥漫着一股墓地的腐败气息。或许你的先祖曾是一名实力强劲的巫妖或吸血鬼，也可能是你自出生便是死者，只是突然被复活了而已。无论如何，死亡之力在你的身上流淌，影响着你的每个动作。你可以呼唤死者的邪恶力量。不幸的是，你每使用一次这种力量，就会离加入它们更近一步。
亡灵血承额外专长：战斗施法、顽石强韧、钢铁意志、技能专攻（学识：宗教）、法术专攻、高等法术专攻、健壮、顽强。

enGB: Blood Line Undead Arcana
zhCN: 亡灵血承奥法

enGB: The additional special skills bestowed by the Bloodline Undead
zhCN: 亡灵血承赋予的额外本职技能

enGB: Ray Of Enfeeblement
zhCN: 衰弱射线

enGB:
When reaching level 3, and every 2 levels thereafter, the Warlock can learn an additional spell from Bloodline. This spell is not counted towards the number of spells granted by the new level.
Weakness Ray: A dazzling ray shoots out from your hand. You need to successfully make a ranged touch attack check to hit the target. The target will suffer 1d6 + 1 point of strength penalty per 2 levels of the caster (up to a maximum of 1d6 + 5 points). The target's strength will not be reduced below 1 point. A successful Fortitude saving throw halves the penalty. Multiple penalties do not stack; only the highest penalty is taken.
zhCN:
达到3级时，以及之后每升2级，术士都可以额外学习一个来自于血承的法术。该法术不计入新等级赋予的法术数量。
衰弱射线：一道耀眼的射线从你的手中射出。你需要成功进行远程接触攻击检定，才能够击中目标。目标会受到1d6+每两个施法者等级1点力量减值（最高1d6+5点）。目标的力量不会被降到1点以下。强韧豁免成功可使减值减半。多个减值不会叠加，只取其中最高的减值。

enGB: Immunity Precision Damage
zhCN: 无漏之躯

enGB: Your body has transcended the limitations of the physical world. There are no conventional vulnerabilities. You are immune to precise damage, such as sneak attacks.
zhCN: 你的身躯已经超脱了肉体凡胎的限制，不存在常规意义上的要害，你可以免疫精准伤害，例如偷袭。

enGB: Dhampir Resonance
zhCN: 吸血鬼共鸣

enGB: Your veins are infused with the power of the undead. When using spells from the Necromancy School, the caster's level increases by a fourth of the character's level.
zhCN: 吸血裔能与死亡的力量共鸣，使用死灵学派法术时施法者等级提升1/4角色等级。

enGB: Resonate with the power of death through your blood, and your caster level for the Necromancy school will increase based on your character level.
zhCN: 通过你的血脉与死亡的力量共鸣，根据角色等级提升用于死灵学派的施法者等级

enGB:
Gebian Necromancer adds Lore (Religion) to their list of class skills. Gebian Necromancer gains a +1 bonus on attack rolls, AC, and initiative checks, and gains a +1 bonus on damage rolls made with necromancy spells.
If the character already has the class skill, weapon proficiency or armor proficiency granted by the selected background from her class during character creation, then the corresponding bonuses from background change to a +1 competence bonus in case of skills, a +1 enhancement bonus in case of weapon proficiency and a -1 Armor Check Penalty reduction in case of armor proficiency.
zhCN:
盖布死灵师将学识（宗教）加入本职技能列表。其召唤的不死生物和死灵生物伙伴的攻击检定、AC和先攻获得+1加值，并且自身在使用死灵法术造成的伤害上获得+1加值。
如果角色已在角色创建过程中，通过职业获取了上述本职技能，武器擅长或防具擅长，则背景提供的相应加值改为相关技能上的+1表现加值，相关武器上的+1增强加值，相关防具上的防具检定减值–1。

enGB: The balance between life and death has been shattered within you. The frigid breath of death has completely overwhelmed your vitality, and you have been fully transformed into an undead creature.
zhCN: 生死之间的平衡在你身上被打破了，冰冷的死气完全压倒你的生机，你彻底转变成一名不死生物。

enGB: Upon reaching Level 20, your body is permeated by the power of death, and you no longer possess vital organs in the conventional sense. You gain immunity to cold, paralysis, sleep, and precision damage. You also acquire damage reduction 5/—. Additionally, you get a +4 morale bonus on saving throws against spells and spell-like abilities cast by undead creatures.
zhCN: 达到20级后，你的躯体被死亡的力量浸润了，再也没有常规意义上的要害，你对寒冷、麻痹、睡眠和精准伤害免疫。同时获得伤害减免5/—。你在对抗不死生物施展的法术和类法术能力时，豁免检定获得+4士气加值。

enGB: Limited to three uses per day, you can drain blood from a living creature or from the corpse of a living being. When you do so, you gain 5 temporary hit points, plus an additional 5 temporary hit points for every three Hit Dice you possess. You also gain a +1 bonus on Fortitude saving throws. All these effects last for 1 hour.
zhCN: 每日限三次，你可以从一个活物身上吸血，或者从活物的尸体上吸血。若如此做，你获得5点临时生命值，你每拥有三个生命骰，额外获得5点临时生命值。你还会在强韧豁免检定上获得+1加值。以上效果持续1小时。

enGB:
When reaching level 7, and every 6 levels thereafter, the sorcerer gains 1 additional feat, which is selected from the feat list corresponding to each bloodline. The character must meet the prerequisites of the additional feat.
Additional Feats for Undead Bloodline: Combat Casting, Diehard, Iron Will, Skill Focus (Knowledge: Religion), Spell Focus, Greater Spell Focus, Toughness, Tenacious, Metamagic (Maximize Spell).
zhCN:
达到7级时，以及之后每升6级，术士都会获得1个额外专长，从各血承对应的专长列表中选择。角色必须满足额外专长的先决条件。
亡灵血承额外专长：战斗施法、顽石强韧、钢铁意志、技能专攻（学识：宗教）、法术专攻、高等法术专攻、健壮，顽强，超魔（法术极效）。

enGB: The affected creature becomes frightened. If the subject succeeds at a Will save, it is shaken for 1d4 rounds. Creatures with 6 or more HD are immune to this effect. Cause fear dispels remove fear.
zhCN: 受到法术影响的生物会陷入惊恐状态。如果目标意志豁免成功，则陷入战栗状态 1D4轮。生命骰数不低于 6 的生物免疫该效果。惊恐术能够解除移除恐惧。

enGB: The subject is immediately sickened for the spell’s duration. A successful Fortitude save negates this effect. If the target is already sickened and fails the Fortitude save again, it becomes nauseated instead.
zhCN: 在法术持续时间内，目标陷入恶心状态。若目标通过强韧豁免，则免除此效果。若目标已经处于恶心状态且再次强韧豁免失败，则改为陷入反胃状态。
